title: Spanish Bishop on Maya Societies SAQ2

content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. Using the excerpt, respond to parts a, b, and c. Identify ONE likely audience for the account provided in the passage. Explain ONE way in which the passage illustrates a similarity between the political system of the Maya and a political system in Afro-Eurasia in the period before circa 1750. Explain ONE way in which the passage illustrates a difference between the political system of the Maya and a political system in Afro-Eurasia in the period before circa 1750.
